mapper.select: select mem.membno, mem.name, mem.nickname, mem.mem_imgno, com.content, com.stars, com.recommend, com.regdate, com.up_date, com.movbno, com.combno FROM tbl_movies_comment com INNER JOIN tbl_member mem on com.membno = mem.membno WHERE com.movbno = #{movbno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movies_comment (combno, movbno, content, membno, regdate, stars) values(seq_comment.nextval, #{movBno}, #{content}, #{memBno}, sysdate, #{stars})
